titleStmt.title: The vanity of judiciary astrology. Or Divination by the stars. Lately written in Latine, by that great schollar and mathematician the illustrious Petrus Gassendus; mathematical professor to the king of France. Translated into English by a person of quality
titleStmt.author: Gassendi, Pierre, 1592-1655.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Giles Calvert, and sold at his shop at the West end of St. Pauls Church, at the signe of the black Spread Eagle,

notesStmt.note: Translation of part of Pierre Gassendi's Physica.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the West end of St. Pauls Church, at the signe of the black Spread Eagle
